basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Proficient Full-Stack Developer with expertise in React.js, TypeScript, and AI/ML integration, including OpenAI APIs for LLM models. Experienced in developing scalable web applications, frontend development with Tailwind CSS, and backend services using Node.js and Express.js. Skilled in DevOps practices with Docker, Git, and CI/CD pipelines, delivering high-quality solutions in agile environments.
